summary.span: 代表具有四個單精確度浮點值的向量。

span.span: Represents a vector with four single-precision floating-point values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構提供硬體加速的支援。The structure provides support for hardware acceleration. [!INCLUDE[vectors-are-rows-paragraph](~/includes/system-numerics-vectors-are-rows.md)]

span.span: Creates a new instance of the structure.

summary.span: 將向量的元素複製到指定的陣列。

span.span: Copies the elements of the vector to a specified array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `array` 必須有至少四個項目。`array` must have at least four elements. 方法會複製為向量的元素索引 0 開始。The method copies the vector's elements starting at index 0.

exception.span: 目前執行個體中的項目數大於陣列中的項目數。

span.span: The number of elements in the current instance is greater than in the array.

summary.span: 從指定的索引位置開始，將向量的元素複製到指定的陣列。

span.span: Copies the elements of the vector to a specified array starting at a specified index position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `array` 必須有足夠數目的項目，以容納的四個向量的項目。`array` must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the four vector elements. 換句話說，項目`index`經由`index`+ 3 必須已存在於`array`。In other words, elements `index` through `index` + 3 must already exist in `array`.

exception.span: 目前執行個體中的項目數大於陣列中的項目數。

span.span: The number of elements in the current instance is greater than in the array.
is greater than or equal to the array length.

summary.span: 傳回目前 執行個體的字串表示。

span.span: Returns the string representation of the current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ToString ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String
public: override System::String ^ ToString();
override this.ToString : unit -> string

summary.span: 使用預設格式傳回目前執行個體的字串表示。

span.span: Returns the string representation of the current instance using default formatting.

returns.span: 目前執行個體的字串表示。

span.span: The string representation of the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回在其中向量的每個項目會格式化使用的"G"（一般） 的格式字串和目前執行緒文化特性的格式化慣例的字串。This method returns a string in which each element of the vector is formatted using the "G" (general) format string and the formatting conventions of the current thread culture. 「\<"和">"字元用來開始和結束的字串中和目前的文化特性後接空格的屬性用來分隔每個項目。The "\<" and ">" characters are used to begin and end the string, and the current culture's property followed by a space is used to separate each element.

.method public hidebysig instance string ToString(string format) cil managed
Public Function ToString (format As String) As String
public: System::String ^ ToString(System::String ^ format);
override this.ToString : string -> string

param.name: format
param.span: 標準或自訂數值格式字串，其定義個別項目的格式。

span.span: A standard or custom numeric format string that defines the format of individual elements.

summary.span: 使用指定格式字串來格式化個別項目，傳回目前執行個體的字串表示。

span.span: Returns the string representation of the current instance using the specified format string to format individual elements.

returns.span: 目前執行個體的字串表示。

span.span: The string representation of the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回的字串，其所在的向量的每個項目會格式化使用`format`和目前的文化特性的格式化慣例。This method returns a string in which each element of the vector is formatted using `format` and the current culture's formatting conventions. 「\<"和">"字元用來開始和結束的字串中和目前的文化特性後接空格的屬性用來分隔每個項目。The "\<" and ">" characters are used to begin and end the string, and the current culture's property followed by a space is used to separate each element.

param.name: format
param.span: 標準或自訂數值格式字串，其定義個別項目的格式。

span.span: A standard or custom numeric format string that defines the format of individual elements.

param.name: formatProvider
param.span: 格式提供者，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。

span.span: A format provider that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

summary.span: 使用指定格式字串來格式化個別項目，以及使用指定的格式提供者來定義特定文化特性的格式，傳回目前執行個體的字串表示。

span.span: Returns the string representation of the current instance using the specified format string to format individual elements and the specified format provider to define culture-specific formatting.

returns.span: 目前執行個體的字串表示。

span.span: The string representation of the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回的字串，在其中向量的每個項目會使用格式化`format`和`formatProvider`。This method returns a string in which each element of the vector is formatted using `format` and `formatProvider`. 「\<"和">"字元用來開始和結束字串和格式提供者的後接空格的屬性用來分隔每個項目。The "\<" and ">" characters are used to begin and end the string, and the format provider's property followed by a space is used to separate each element.
